Package com.example.lotteryevent.repository

Class NotificationRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotteryevent.repository.NotificationRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
INotificationRepository
public class NotificationRepositoryImpl extends Object implements INotificationRepository
Implements INotificationRepository Allows for marking notifs as seen and detaching notif listener

    • detachListener

      public void detachListener()
      Detaches the real-time Firestore listener to prevent memory leaks. This must be called when the data is no longer needed.
      Specified by:
      detachListener in interface INotificationRepository

    • fetchNotificationsForEvent

      This method fetches the notifications associated with a specific event ordering notis by timestamp in descending order (Newest notifications appear first)
      Specified by:
      fetchNotificationsForEvent in interface INotificationRepository
      Parameters:
      eventId - Identifier for the event notifications are retrieved for

    • getUserName

      public void getUserName(String userId, INotificationRepository.UserNameCallback callback)
      Fetches the display name of a user based on their User ID.

      This is commonly used in Admin views to translate a recipient ID into a readable name. The result is returned asynchronously via the provided callback.

      Specified by:
      getUserName in interface INotificationRepository
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user to look up.
      callback - The callback interface to handle the result (name or error string).
